title: Our Matt
creator_credit: Noel Withers, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Noel Withers is very proud of his son Matt. Born with Crouzon Syndrome, Matt suffered hearing loss, facial abnomalities and had to undergo numerous procedures to accommodate brain growth. Some operations were more successful than others, but Matt faced them all with a determination that inspired admiration in those around him.
